description:
API Support for your favorite torrent trackers.

Jackett works as a proxy server, it translates queries from apps (Sonarr, Radarr, SickRage, CouchPotato, Mylar, etc) into tracker-site-specific http queries, parses the html response, then sends results back to the requesting software.
This allows for getting recent uploads (like RSS) and performing searches.
Jackett is a single repository of maintained indexer scraping and translation logic - removing the burden from other apps.
Changes:
- gktorrent: use /home for keywordless search
- torrentgalaxy: add requestdelay. #15358
- publicBrazilianIndexerBase and dependent indexers: drop duplicate magnet link. resolves #15775  #15774  #15773  #15771  #15769
- btdirectory: fix magnet selector. resolves #15770
- emuwarez: append Spanish to titles. resolves #15768
- rudub: bump domains
- peeratiko: CA expired
- lastfiles: new selectors for title,details,poster,genre
- ilcorsaronero: fix rows selector with no search results [ #15772 ]
This list of changes was auto generated.
